snippet: Sush Krishnamoorthy, a student at Sardar Patel Vidyalaya, in New Delhi, is one of eight high school seniors around the world blogging about their college searches for The Choice.
abstract: Sush Krishnamoorthy, a student at Sardar Patel Vidyalaya, in New Delhi, is one of eight high school seniors around the world blogging about their college searches for The Choice.

headline.main: Searching U.S. Colleges, Doubt Creeps In Amid the Confidence
